caller_intent: Heather Scott from Alliance Insurance is requesting a copy of the caller's auto policy declaration to provide a bundled home and auto insurance quote.
resolution_steps: Agent left a voicemail message requesting the auto policy declaration.
Provided email address (heather s s and sam) and website (myallianceinsurance.com) for document submission.
Mentioned sending a link and separate email for additional information.
Included phone number (336-377-9003) for direct contact.
knowledge_required: Document collection procedures for policy bundling
summary: Heather Scott from Alliance Insurance left a voicemail requesting an auto policy declaration to provide a bundled insurance quote. She provided contact details for document submission and follow-up. The call was not connected to a live agent but included actionable instructions for the recipient.
